tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE wine_tasting_tours (
  tour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  destination VARCHAR(255),
  itinerary TEXT,
  date TIMESTAMP,
  participant_name VARCHAR(100),
  participant_email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE wine_tours (
  tour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  destination_id INT,
  tour_date DATE,
  tour_guide_name TEXT,
  participant_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE Itineraries (
    itinerary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination_id INT,
    tour_date DATE,
    tour_guide VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (destination_id) REFERENCES Destinations(destination_id)
);

CREATE TABLE tour_schedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    itinerary_id INT,
    participant_id INT,
    tour_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (itinerary_id) REFERENCES itineraries(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants(id)
);

CREATE TABLE destinations (
    destination_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination_name TEXT,
    address TEXT,
    city TEXT,
    country TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE itineraries (
    itinerary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination_id INT,
    tour_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (destination_id) REFERENCES destinations(destination_id)
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE tour_participants (
    tour_id INT,
    participant_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY(tour_id, participant_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tour_id) REFERENCES itineraries(itinerary_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tour_id INT,
    rating INT,
    review TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (tour_id) REFERENCES itineraries(itinerary_id)
);
